Ending Forced Arbitration of Sexual Assault and Sexual Harassment Act of 2021
To amend title 9 of the United States Code with respect to arbitration of disputes involving sexual assault and sexual harassment.

Also, the resolution provides that proceedings may be postponed through March 3, 2022 on measures that were the object of motions to suspend the rules on the legislative day of February 1, 2022, and on which the yeas and nays were ordered.

bill.summary:
Ending Forced Arbitration of Sexual Assault and Sexual Harassment Act of 2021
This bill invalidates arbitration agreements that preclude a party from filing a lawsuit in court involving sexual assault or sexual harassment, at the election of the party alleging such conduct.
